name: Super Hero Hexa Puzzle
description:
Super Hero Hexa Puzzle is a classic Hexa puzzle game with improved graphics and smooth interface for a great use experience.
Super Hero Hexa Puzzle has a relaxing gameplay. Super Hero Hexa Puzzle is a simple and addictive block puzzle game that challenges your brain and
helps to improve logic and concentration across different age groups.
Discover the most challenging mobile game of the year and find your new addiction right now!

Super Hero Hexa Puzzle has a very easy game play. All you need to do is to drag and drop the blocks to fill in the blanks!
Fill all the blanks correctly to unlock more Levels. If you are stuck on a level, you can use “Hints” to help you spot a clue.

Beware of the extra Blocks that don't fit in the blanks.


FEATURES

- Over 200 brain twisting block puzzle levels with 4 difficulty modes await you to challenge!
- Become a block puzzle MASTER in the simplest way.
- Soothing sounds and gorgeous visual effects.
- Different hexagonal objects give you a visually pleasing and relaxing gameplay.
- EASY to play!


Are you ready to train your brain and enjoy the fun from solving a puzzle?
We hope you enjoy the simplest yet exciting fun! Have a good time in Super Hero Hexa Puzzle!
